title: Meddzs
author: Meddzs
content: Hello, I'm looking for a part time or a full time job as a graphic designer, you can view my portfolio on this thread (active since 4 years ago till now)https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=4705588.0Salary is negotiable, so if you are looking for a designer hit me at:https://t.me/Meddzzmeddzs93@gmail.comor PM me here.

comments.author: SFR10
comments.body: Quote from: Meddzs on June 27, 2022, 09:09:08 AMI'm looking for a part time or a full time job as a graphic designer,Quote from: Meddzs on July 04, 2022, 09:29:33 AMBumpConsidering that the ratio of clients to designers has been on a steep decline in the past year or two, you should expand into "other platforms" to increase the chances of landing a job.- You might want to start with the following subreddits: Jobs4Bitcoins and BitcoinJobs

comments.author: Meddzs
comments.body: Quote from: SFR10 on July 04, 2022, 10:08:36 AMQuote from: Meddzs on June 27, 2022, 09:09:08 AMI'm looking for a part time or a full time job as a graphic designer,Quote from: Meddzs on July 04, 2022, 09:29:33 AMBumpConsidering that the ratio of clients to designers has been on a steep decline in the past year or two, you should expand into "other platforms" to increase the chances of landing a job.- You might want to start with the following subreddits: Jobs4Bitcoins and BitcoinJobsThank you, that's helpful!

comments.author: noormcs5
comments.body: Quote from: Meddzs on June 27, 2022, 09:09:08 AMHello, I'm looking for a part time or a full time job as a graphic designer, you can view my portfolio on this thread (active since 4 years ago till now)https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=4705588.0Salary is negotiable, so if you are looking for a designer hit me at:https://t.me/Meddzzmeddzs93@gmail.comor PM me here.I have seen your other thread which contains your complete portfolio. I just wonder wouldn't it be better if you just bump that thread rather than make this new thread. Anyways i like your work / portfolio and i am sure you will get work if someone needs graphic design work.

Anyways i like your work / portfolio and i am sure you will get work if someone needs graphic design work.The other one is more for freelance gigs, I have time for a part time or even a full time job right now
